title: How to Use the Organa Knowledge Base
description: This article explains how to navigate, search, and create content within the Organa Knowledge Base.

sections.heading: Navigation
sections.body: Use the sidebar to browse categories and select articles.

sections.heading: Searching
sections.body: Use the search bar at the top to quickly find relevant content.

sections.heading: Creating Articles
sections.body: Admins can create new articles using the Create button in the top navigation.
